PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05292021-06-10,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) increase fine amounts for contraventions of the Railway Safety Act currently listed under Schedule X to the Contraventions Regulations; and (2) update the short-form description for the contravention currently listed under item 3 of Part I.2 of Schedule 1 of the Contraventions Regulations to reflect the new wording of subsection 2(3) of the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0132 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
